pr_title: Fix #2047: Made Readiness#isReady more reliable for StatefulSets

timeline.bodyText: please add license header using mvn -N license:format

replies.bodyText: Done. Please refer to my latest commit.

timeline.message:
Made Readiness#isReady more reliable for StatefulSets by checking the amount of replicas from 'spec' against the amount of ready replicas from status.

This commit fixes #2047
